titles.title: IRGC Terrorist Designation Act
IRGC Terrorist Designation Act
A bill to direct the Secretary of State to submit to Congress a report on the designation of Iran's Revolutionary Guard Corps as a foreign terrorist organization, and for other purposes.
IRGC Terrorist Designation Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

bill.summary:
IRGC Terrorist Designation Act
This bill expresses the sense of Congress that Iran's Revolutionary Guard Corps (IRGC) meets the criteria for designation as a foreign terrorist organization and should be so designated by the Department of State.
State shall report to Congress on whether the IRGC meets such criteria and, if not, on which criteria have not been met.
